column2: This is a 4.5 star restaurant to me
column3: but I am giving 5 because (first of all they don't have 4.5 officially
column4: but also) their brisket was something special.  It was so tender and juicy but still the texture was intact.  We also loved the St. Louise rib.  However
column5: their baby back rib was dry and just ok.  I would definitely recommend
column6: as a lot of people say
column7: to try briskets and baby back rib.
